_header: Pride is head of all kind sin
_description: The Seven Deadly Sins — sixteen couplets

CULFf238.First Lines:
Pryde ys hedd of allyre synneþat makyþ mannys soule fro
                    god to twynneTo wyckyd hyghnes he wole ayAnd loueþ to moche hys
                    owne noblay…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…These ben the synnes seueneThat reuen men þe blys of
                    heuene
CULFf238.Attributed Title: Here suen þe vii deedly synnes (f. 32vb)
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
Pride is hed of all maner synthat makith mannys soule from god to
                    wynTo wickydnes & hyghnes he will ayAnd louyth to moche his own
                    noblay…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…Theis be þe synnys sevynThat Reuyn men þe blis of
                    hevyn
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title:
The vii dedly synnes (f. 107v); The vii dedly synnys (RT, f.
                    108); These ben þe vii deedly synnis þat folowith (added by later
                    hand, f. 107v)

BLHar1706.First Lines: Pryde ys hede of alle kynne synneþat makeþ mannes soule fro god to twyne…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þese ben þe synnes seueneþat reuen a man þe blysse of heuene
BLHar1706.Note: Latin terms for vices in rubric in outer margins beside first line on each.
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.
BLHar1706.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 205.

BLHar2339.First Lines:
Pride is heed of all kyns synneþat makiþ mannys soule fro
                    god to twyn…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…These ben þe synnes seueneÞat reuen men þe
                    blis of heuene
BLHar2339.Attributed Title:
Þese ben þe vij deedly synnes þat suen (rubricated, f.
                        116v)
BLHar2339.Editions:
Black,  William Henry. 
             “A Paraphrase on the Seven Penitential Psalms.” 
             Percy Society
         7. London: Richards, 1842: 61-2.

Ushaw28.First Lines:
Pride is hede of alle kinnesse synþat makeþe mannes soule
                    fro god to twyn…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…þies ben þe synnes seuenþat reuen a man
                    þe blisse of heuen
